t: FullScreen Desktop Browser - App on Amazon Appstore

t: Amazon Prime Video displays incorrect aspect ratio
s: If you are using the Prime Video app from Amazon on your Samsung Smart TV and notice that the aspect ratio does not appear correctly, there is a firmware that is available to fix the issue. This guide will let you know how to get the update.

t: Amazon Prime doesn't play some HD videos full scre... - Sony
s: October 9, 2022 - Just getting to grips with my 1 III, and encountered a weird issue with my library in Amazon Prime. Some HD films are displayed with big black bars all around them, as though the phone thinks they are in 4K. I think I've got to the bottom of why... They are all films where no 4K version exists, ...
